titles.title: A resolution reaffirming a strong commitment to the U.S. producers and American-made commodities.
A resolution reaffirming a strong commitment to the U.S. producers and American-made commodities.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses that the Senate supports legislation to reinstate Country-of-Origin labeling for pork and beef to allow consumers to make an informed and free choice about where their food comes from.
